### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.youtube.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F) ### Comment > 兩個截圖都是開著AdGuard的狀態，但仍然有廣告，不能正確封鎖；且於Youtube網頁下，AdGuard插件介面會變為空白，其他頁面則正常。 > > Both screenshots were taken while AdGuard was enabled, but there are still ads that cannot be blocked properly. issue.title: sky.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.49.3b9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://news.sky.com/story/eurydice-dixon-man-jailed-for-evil-rape-and-murder-of-australian-comedian-11800417

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Cookie message being allowed by AdGuard's Cookie filter, caused by `@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/wrapper/`
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![Screenshot from 2023-05-11 22-53-18](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/89158249/c37889bf-bbcb-4632-ba79-a2c5fcd4463f)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: gotos.in
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://gotos.in/you+have+to+write+a+really+really+long+url+to+get+to+650+characters.+like+seriously+you+have+no+idea+how+long+it+has+to+be+650+characters+is+absolutely+freaking+enormous.+You+can+fit+sooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo+much+data+into+650+characters.+My+hands+are+getting+tired+typing+this+many+characters.+I+didnt+even+realise+how+long+it+was+going+to+take+to+type+them+all.+So+many+characters.+I'm+bored+now+so+I'll+just+copy+and+paste.+I'm+bored+now+so+I'll+just+copy+and+paste+RIy+.I'm+bored+now+so+I'll+just+copy+and+paste.I'm+bored+now+so+I'll+just+copy+and+paste.I'm+bored+now+so+I'll+just+copy+and+paste.+It+has+to+be+freaking+enormously+freaking+enormous](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgotos.in%2Fyou%2Bhave%2Bto%2Bwrite%2Ba%2Breally%2Breally%2Blong%2Burl%2Bto%2Bget%2Bto%2B650%2Bcharacters.%2Blike%2Bseriously%2Byou%2Bhave%2Bno%2Bidea%2Bhow%2Blong%2Bit%2Bhas%2Bto%2Bbe%2B650%2Bcharacters%2Bis%2Babsolutely%2Bfreaking%2Benormous.%2BYou%2Bcan%2Bfit%2Bsooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo%2Bmuch%2Bdata%2Binto%2B650%2Bcharacters.%2BMy%2Bhands%2Bare%2Bgetting%2Btired%2Btyping%2Bthis%2Bmany%2Bcharacters.%2BI%2Bdidnt%2Beven%2Brealise%2Bhow%2Blong%2Bit%2Bwas%2Bgoing%2Bto%2Btake%2Bto%2Btype%2Bthem%2Ball.%2BSo%2Bmany%2Bcharacters.%2BI'm%2Bbored%2Bnow%2Bso%2BI'll%2Bjust%2Bcopy%2Band%2Bpaste.%2BI'm%2Bbored%2Bnow%2Bso%2BI'll%2Bjust%2Bcopy%2Band%2Bpaste%2BRIy%2B.I'm%2Bbored%2Bnow%2Bso%2BI'll%2Bjust%2Bcopy%2Band%2Bpaste.I'm%2Bbored%2Bnow%2Bso%2BI'll%2Bjust%2Bcopy%2Band%2Bpaste.I'm%2Bbored%2Bnow%2Bso%2BI'll%2Bjust%2Bcopy%2Band%2Bpaste.%2BIt%2Bhas%2Bto%2Bbe%2Bfreaking%2Benormously%2Bfreaking%2Benormous) ### Screenshots
